nachos.machine

类 Kernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • nachos.machine.Kernel
  • 直接已知子类:
    ThreadedKernel

    public abstract class Kernel
extends java.lang.Object
    An OS kernel.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static Kernel kernel
      Globally accessible reference to the kernel.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Kernel()
      Allocate a new kernel.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract void initialize(java.lang.String[] args)
      Initialize this kernel.
      abstract void run()
      Begin executing user programs, if applicable.
      abstract void selfTest()
      Test that this module works.
      abstract void terminate()
      Terminate this kernel.

        public static Kernel kernel
        Globally accessible reference to the kernel.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Kernel

        public Kernel()

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public abstract void initialize(java.lang.String[] args)
        Initialize this kernel.

      • selfTest

        public abstract void selfTest()
        Test that this module works. Warning: this method will not be invoked by the autograder when we grade your projects. You should perform all initialization in initialize().

      • run

        public abstract void run()
        Begin executing user programs, if applicable.

      • terminate

        public abstract void terminate()
        Terminate this kernel. Never returns.
